Detailed Description

Represents a WinMobile GDI drawing interface.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

void WFAPI::WinMobileGDIDrawer::doSwap ( HDC  destDC  ) 

Blits the map unto the specified DC.

HDC WFAPI::WinMobileGDIDrawer::getBackBuffer (  ) 

Use this call in conjunction with the the callback function mapIsReadyToBeDrawn to draw stuff on top of the map before the map is flipped to the screen.

Returns:
The backbuffer that will be flipped to the screen.

DrawingContext* WFAPI::WinMobileGDIDrawer::getDrawingContext (  ) 

Returns the drawing context associated with the drawer.
